body:
Initially, I was thinking the one girl had gone bat-shit crazy from separation...but that wasn't the case, exactly; if her friend hadn't deceived her, she would have, she was well on the way.

The last bit was classic. 

I was checking his work out due to his being the mangaka producing Mushoku Tensei: Roxy datte Honki desu
(Mushoku Tensei: Roxy Gets Serious), and it's clear that his grasp of humour in this field is just a great.
Holy shit this is actually fucked up
